prompt: Create an underwater scene featuring an exotic marine creature known as the Jewel-Scaled Sea Serpent. This serpent is adorned with dazzling, gem-like scales that shimmer in every color of the rainbow. It swims gracefully through a vibrant coral reef, surrounded by schools of brightly-colored fish. The reef is filled with an array of corals in various shapes and hues, with shafts of light filtering down from the surface, giving the whole scene an ethereal glow. Capture the mystical and vibrant nature of this undersea world.
